channel.title: Need help with 508 client
channel.description:
Hi, I downloaded 508 cache, server, and client.Downloaded server and client first, extracted em. Downloaded cache, placed in C:/ drive in folder cache 508, extracted rs2, tryed to run client got this:
[code]Error: SignLink:233 SignLink:372 Applet_Sub1:338 client:2196 | java.lang.Runtime Exception [/code]
Placed rs2 in, right spot. Did everything right. What's wrong?

item.title: Need help with 508 client
item.dc:creator: @xx_qwertyuiop_xx xx qwertyuiop xx
item.description:
@xx_qwertyuiop_xx wrote:

And it’s in the wrong section. You should make your own topic in the correct section (Client Hacking).
I think this occurs when the client can’t connect to the update server while starting up. Make sure your server is open.

Read full topic

oh and try running server b4 client. please help me with my problem :/[/quote]
This topic is a few months old.
